name: INSE-PAIR-ABLE
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam from January-29 to January-31 2021. The first online jam session.

In inse-pair-able, you help orphan socks find a new match!
Try to find the most compatible sock for each of your lonely, laundry hearts, and create new pairs from single socks!
But it's not all about looks - each sock has a personality, and they might be surprised by how well they get along! Ask questions to the socks to make them talk about themselves, understand them, and find the sock with whom they'll be inse-pair-able

CREDITS

Game Design: fae.exe, Yasmina D.
Graphic Design: Alyd Asmar, Yasmina D.
Narrative Design: fae.exe
Programmers: Medhi Pierron, Perficio
Sound Design: impact
UX/UI Design: fae.exe, Yasmina D.
VFX : Horace Ribout
